channel.description: Recent content in git on Varun Saini

item.title: remove big file from git repo
item.description: Sometimes you push a big binary/text(etc.) file to your git repo and these files stay in your git history. Your repo size go to roof and it takes time to clone that repo, which is a big pain. One of my git repo at work had a big binary(logstash deb file) in history and it was inflating the repo size to over 80mb. So I thought of cleaning the repo and bring down the size.
